LanguageData.RGK_Wall.label: 壁
LanguageData.RGK_Wall.description: 邪魔にならない壁です。屋根を支えることができます。
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.GL_Wall.label: wall
LanguageData.GL_Wall.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.label: 壁（換気口付)
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.description: 空気を換気できる壁です。
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Blueprint.label: vent wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.label: vent wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.GL_VentWall.label: vent wall
LanguageData.GL_VentWall.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Blueprint.label: vent wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Frame.label: vent wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Frame.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.RGK_window.label: 窓
LanguageData.RGK_window.description: 外を見ることができる窓です。
LanguageData.RGK_window_Blueprint_Install.label: window (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.label: 壁（窓付)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.description: 光を通す窓か付いた壁です。
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Blueprint.label: window wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.label: window wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall.label: window wall
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Blueprint.label: window wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Frame.label: window wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Frame.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.label: フェンス
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.description: 家畜を閉じ込めたり、野生の捕食動物から保護するためのフェンスです。
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Blueprint.label: fence (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.label: fence (building)
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.description: A fence to trap livestock or protect it from outside beasts.
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall.label: 壁（花の装飾付)
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall.description: 花で飾られている壁です。
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall_Blueprint.label: Flower wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall_Frame.label: Flower wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.label: アンティークドア
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.description: 部屋を隔てる手動扉です。手動で開閉しなければならないので通過する速度が遅くなります。移動速度が遅くなる量は、ドアの材質によって決まります。
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Blueprint.label: antique door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Frame.label: antique door (building)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.RGK_Door.label: フェンスドア
LanguageData.RGK_Door.description: 部屋を隔てる扉です。手で開け閉めしないといけない分だけ通過するのが遅くなります。低下する移動速度はドアの材質によって異なります。
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Blueprint.label: fence door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.label: fence door (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame.label: ドアフレーム
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame.description: ドアを装飾するためのドア枠です。
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame_Blueprint.label: door frame (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame_Frame.label: door frame (building)
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame_Frame.description: It is a frame to decorate the door.
